item.description:
3 Day Detox Juice Fast with Imani Thursday, June 2 - Saturday, June 4th

@ Glastonbury Naturopathic Center ~ Fresh, Organic Juices provided by Alchemy!

Join the MamaLicious Tribe for an activation of your most authentic self! Give your body a break and create new imprints for vitality and health! A supportive network for you to purify, cleanse and detox.

 

Day One- Join us for a one hour informational talk on Thursday, June 2nd at 6pm to discuss the nutritional benefits and how-to’s on juicing and connect with others that will offer support during your three day transformation! Pick up your organic, fresh juices for the following day.

 

Day Two & Three- daily check-in and juice pick-up (Glastonbury or Hartford)

Pick-up between 4-6pm (Fri) and 2-4pm (Sat)

 

Investment: $150,

includes juices for three days, daily E3 Live shot, introductory meeting and daily check-ins.

To register for this life-changing program, email Imani@themamalution.com or call 860.983.5276

 

Additional Detox Therapies (colonic, infrared sauna, massage) available for additional $150 through Wholistic Spa. Please contact the office to book your appointment at 860.657.4105

Discounted Rates for  Advanced Detoxification Therapies at Glastonbury Naturopathic Center will also be offered from Glastonbury Naturopathic Center to participants of the juice groups at additional cost:


*All Advanced Detox therapies must be used within 2 weeks of the juice class, after that time regular rates apply:
-One 60 min. Colon Hydrotherapy session $89
-One 60 min. Therapeutic Massage $60
-One 30 min. Therapeutic infrared Sauna $20


Special Package of all 3 $150 *must be used all in the same day within 2 weeks of the juice group to receive discount, after that regular rates will apply
item.name: 3 Day Juice Cleanse
